name: ScumSpy
description:
Search for certain houses in the town and check for it's resident's Internet history. Are they suspicious? Take actions!

This game was made for the Mini Jam 47 in less than 72 hours - https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-47-internet.

Controls
  • W, A, S, D - movement
  • Space - boost
Music

Music by Eric Matyas - www.soundimage.org

Sounds

Sounds from  https://freesound.org/
